text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Hah.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(I've thought about it some more since then, but… 
how exactly do I put in more effort?)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (So far, I've been doing everything to change myself… or that was the plan at least.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …But I haven't changed at all.

text_block_list.name: Young Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Alright! 
Let's go run another one then!

text_block_list.name: Young Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Me too! 
Wait up big sis～!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…I could never… 
be like them… and yet…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (And yet… trainer praised me. Talked about all of my strong points.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Can I do anything? Anything at all…

Something that I can do… 
I wonder, is there anything like that?
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (Maybe I should ask the trainer directly, just like what that girl from earlier did.)
…And yet, I don't have anything to complain about…
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(Maybe I should try thinking up a menu for my trainer? 
It doesn't have to be training related, maybe if I…)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, I thought up a meal plan for you. 
Of course I would be the one making it, so you don't need to worry about it.

text_block_list.name: Trainer
text_block_list.text: "You even went so far to make it something nutritious and delicious… Thank you! I'd love for you to keep making this, if it's fine with you!?"

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Of course, I don't mind at all. 
Just leave it to me!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…… 
…No… let's… not go with that…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Haah… I just thought of something weird, didn't I. I need to change how I approach this—

text_block_list.name: Joke Loving Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Ah, it's Cheval! What a coinkydink!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Ah… hello. A c-coinkydink?

text_block_list.name: Joke Loving Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
…Fufu, hey, the thing is. 
I just came back from a cafe and you know～

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Huh?
—It's been quite some time since I had a day off, so I've been spending it leisurely at a cafe.
Atop my table was a training textbook, as well as records of Cheval Grand's growth.
choice_data_list: This is a nice change of pace…

text_block_list.text: This change in scenery is enough to lift my mood. Feeling refreshed, I was about to write down a new training menu for Cheval, when—

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: T-trainer… hello…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…Um, I just heard that… you were here. 
So… um…
She had something she wanted to say, but she was fidgeting and was averting her gaze.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Huh? That book… Are you, even on your day off, studying training methods?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: That said, is it… a new training menu, for me?

Now that she said it, this is still work isn't it. 
I was enjoying it so much, I almost forgot that.
choice_data_list: I need to tailor this menu just for you.
I need to tailor this menu just for you.

text_block_list.text: Since Cheval's been growing stronger, I have to keep changing the menu to keep up with her growth.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Ah…

text_block_list.name: Joke Loving Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
…Fufu, hey, the thing is. 
I just came back from a cafe and you know～

text_block_list.name: Joke Loving Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: and there I saw your trainer just chatting it up with both Verxina and Vivlos～

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Huh?

text_block_list.name: Joke Loving Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Perhaps they're trying to scout him? Perhaps they both got their eyes on your trainer～?

text_block_list.name: Joke Loving Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Just～ Kidding! Ahaha, it was a joke! They just passed by and said hi to him, and then… huh, 
Cheval? Wai-, Cheval～!?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (I wonder… what they're talking about…)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(No, something like that is irrelevant. 
But… if they were to get near them, with how sparkling and dazzling they are…)
(If that happened… I wouldn't… even be able to compare to them…)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (…Trainer is… different from me. They're in a different world.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (And yet, they're spending their day off doing this, because of me…)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…T-trainer. 
You should be resting… on your day off.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Aren't you… tired?
choice_data_list: Nope, I'm having fun right now…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Huh?
At first I thought I'd keep my personal and work life balanced, but I just can't stop thinking about training.
choice_data_list: I got it! If you're okay with it—

text_block_list.text: I also wanted to ask her for her opinion. So I prompted her to take a seat if she had the time to spare.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Ah… Um… O-okay…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (…They're going through all of this because of me, and yet…)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (They're still having fun?)
choice_data_list: Okay, so if we go with this—

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (My chest feels… tingly…)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (…What's… going on with me?)
